keyword: how many calories in a muffin blueberry
title: How Many Calories in a Blueberry Muffin?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a muffin blueberry, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving.
h1: How Many Calories in a Blueberry Muffin?
assumptions: Standard bakery-style muffin (~100 g), baked with flour, sugar, eggs, oil, fresh blueberries; no added frosting or nuts.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, size, brand, and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard blueberry muffin has about 350 kcal, with 45 g carbs and 5 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Low-fat recipe (use yogurt instead of oil)

faqs.q: How many calories in a muffin blueberry?
faqs.a: Approximately 350 kcal for a standard 100 g muffin.

faqs.q: What's the carb content in a blueberry muffin?
faqs.a: About 45 g carbs, including 25 g sugars and 2 g fiber per muffin.

faqs.q: Are blueberry muffins high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 15 g total fat per muffin, mostly from oil or butter in the recipe.

faqs.q: How does muffin size affect calories?
faqs.a: Larger muffins (e.g., 150 g) can add 100+ kcal; smaller ones less.

faqs.q: Can I make a healthier blueberry muffin?
faqs.a: Opt for low-fat versions or add more blueberries to boost fiber while cutting sugar.
